thread.title: BRIEF-Alarko Holding Unit Alsim Alarko Sanayi Signs Agreement For Orbit Road Tender (Bakad) Worth $1.67 Bln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Alarko Holding Unit Alsim Alarko Sanayi Signs Agreement For Orbit Road Tender (Bakad) Worth $1.67 Bln

organizations.name: brief-alarko holding unit alsim alarko sanayi signs agreement for orbit road tender (bakad

text:
Feb 7 (Reuters) - ALARKO HOLDING:
* UNIT ALSIM ALARKO SANAYI SIGNS AGREEMENT FOR ORBIT ROAD TENDER (BAKAD) WORTH $1.67 BILLION IN KAZAKHSTAN MINISTRY FOR INVESTMENT AND DEVELOPMENT‍​
* TOTAL DURATION OF THE PROJECT IS 20 YEARS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
